website_summaries.verdict: Stylish short jacket with zipper open/close and zippered pockets, comfortable and versatile for sports or social occasions.
pros: Available in both black and white
Keeps you warm in moderately cold temps with mid-weight sweater knit bonded to anti-pill fleece
Brushed microfiber inner chin guard blocks chilly winds
Convenient hand-warming pockets in front, easy zipper open/close
cons: Some purchasers thought this style runs slightly small
Embroidered spider on left shoulder sleeve, which some may not like

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, flattering fit
customer_reviews.text: If you are familiar with the Spyder brand, then you will appreciate the quality of this jacket. It is the typical Spyder material - a thick cross between sweater and fleece. The lines of this jacket are very flattering - it is shaped at the waist and white piping accents the seams. I found this to run just slightly smaller than my other Spyder jackets but not enough to order a size up. But if you want to wear this over something heavier than a t-shirt or light top, then you might want to consider sizing up. But this is the excellent quality I have come to expect from Spyder.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and product. I love Spyder wear ,and buy a new jacket every season. True to size and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Love Spyder
customer_reviews.text: I love all things Spyder, so this purchase was a no-brainer. I actually bought it as a Christmas gift for my boss, she loved it! I have never had a problem with any Spyder purchase, always great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: A cut above the rest
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my daughter and she loves it. She wears a small and I ordered a small and it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Naven

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. Perfect for where we live. I have told several friends about this jackets and they purchased also. Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Pettersen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The jacket was a perfect fit. The wife loves it! Also, very warm for a lightweight zip up.
customer_reviews.author: LenZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice form fitting jacket. It does run snug so can’t really layer sweater or anything under it.
customer_reviews.author: Wiesey

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and looks Nothing not to like about this product
customer_reviews.text: Comfort and looks Nothing not to like about this product
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Black Premier Light Sweater/Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very form fitting....I love everything about it except the "spider" on the left sleeve! Good quality and enjoy wearing it. Did not realize there was an emblem of a spider on the sleeve!
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and nice looking jacket. I generally wear a medium but ordered a large after reading other reviews. It fits a little large but there is room for sweaters, etc. underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Cycle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little larger than i would have believed spyder to be.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Tight fitting, I need a bigger size.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, but a little snug. Will return and get a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Fit was as expected
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my daughter. She loves it. Great price! Fit was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket to layer with for cold weather under another jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, warm and lite
customer_reviews.text: Spyder makes very warm and stylish jackets. This one is more suited to light weather and wear. They have heavier core hear as well, but this one is great for layering, or else for single use in places like southern California where it can only get mildly chilly from time to time. Consequently it is lightweight and easy to move in, and very breathable. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. As always Spyder comes through again. Great looking jacket
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

product_meta.title: Spyder Women's Premier Light Weight Stryke Fleece Sweater
product_meta.description: The fabric and styles that you love have a new name, with even more color, variety and broadening of the range. CORE sweaters are now Stryke fleece, with the same sweater knit bonded to anti-pill fleece.
feature_bullets: Mid-weight sweater knit bonded to anti-pill fleece
